name: City Sniper:Crime City 2018
description:
City Sniper:Crime City 2018 is a very challenging FPS sniper action game! Urban traffic is facing threats and crime grab and escape. Take the best shot to kill and eliminate every escape crime in the car. Attack enemy hiding in dust and sniper assassin rebellions with a realistic gun leaving no exit for the fierce killer because you are an army commando shot to perform the real mission.
Feature

- Play as sniper agent of the LA city
- Eliminate Thieves and Gangsters
- Easy to play scope, stability, or zoom
- Free Fun Shooting Game 2018
- Ultimate FPS sniper missions
- Smooth gun controls
- Aim and shoot
